alert.note: Alert for Bath (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bath and eastern Greenbrier Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mountain Grove to 6 miles east of Beartown State Park. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warm Springs... Bacova Junction... Lake Moomaw... and Mountain Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern West Virginia.
